title: One Bed - Jul-Sept Move in with Utilities included!! - No Deposit!
posting_body: ['$2,300', '1 unit available for rent now, Jul, Aug & Sept', 'All 1 bedroom/1 bath apartments on a month to month lease term AVAILABLE NOW!', 'No security deposit', 'No broker fee', 'No application fee', 'The Forbes Building is conveniently located on the 39 and 41 bus route on Centre Street in Jamaica Plain.', 'Each unit includes heat, hot water, electric, and a/c unit', 'Building features:', 'Elevators', 'Multiple community spaces', 'Roof Access with city views', 'On-site management', 'A professional maintenance staff', 'Laundry in building', 'On street parking', 'The Forbes Building is located about 15 minutes to downtown Boston, 20 minutes to the Boston Logan Airport, 10 minute walk from Jamaica Pond and Whole Foods and steps away from some of the most delicious restaurants in JP.', '*Not Actual Unit for Rent - Floor plan and some finished the same.', 'Kitchen cabinets and countertops will differ (will be grey colored).']
